pr_title: fix #2410 Add serialized wrappers for Sinks.Empty/Sinks.One

timeline.message: fix# 2410 Add serialized wrappers to SinkEmpty and SinkOne

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change

timeline.body: I am wondering why IDEA renamed this class :D I think we should rename it back to keep the inner class names shorter

timeline.message: fix# 2410 Add serialized wrappers to SinkEmpty and SinkOne
extract SerializedSink as an abstract class and make SerializedOne and SerializedEmpty extend from it
